ScriptName fbmwmgescortscholar1tenscript

Begin GameMode
	if GetQuestRunning fbmwMGEscortScholar1 == 0
		return
	endif

	if GetStage fbmwMGEscortScholar1 < 70
		IF GetDistance mwNartiseArobarEscapeMarker <= 256
			SetStage fbmwMGEscortScholar1 70
			SET fbmwMGEscortScholar1.FollowNow TO 0
			mwTenyeminweREF.EvaluatePackage
			StartConversation player
		ENDIF		
	ENDIF
END
